dc_description_s: This point shapefile is a database compilation of health clinic names in Malawi, with geographic locations and mailing address data. Also included are attributes on incidence of diseases, road access, and structural building infomation. This shapefile can be used to identify locations of health facilites in Malawi as well as related data regarding incidences of various diseases. East View Cartographic, Inc. (2007). Medical & Public Health Facilities: Malawi, 2002-2003. East View Cartographic, Inc. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/sv802xm5496
